description: Manage image builder template error handler.

commands.name: az image builder error-handler add
commands.summary: Add error handler to an existing image builder template.
commands.syntax:
az image builder error-handler add [--defer]
                                   [--ids]
                                   [--name]
                                   [--on-customizer-error {abort, cleanup}]
                                   [--on-validation-error {abort, cleanup}]
                                   [--resource-group]
                                   [--subscription]

commands.name: az image builder error-handler remove
commands.summary: Remove error handler from an existing image builder template.
examples: az image builder error-handler remove -n myTemplate -g myGroup --defer

commands.name: az image builder error-handler show
commands.summary: Show error handler of an existing image builder template.
examples: az image builder error-handler show -n myTemplate -g myGroup --defer
